column4: hi, when i press the quit button on my panel, it does not show the menu (restart, hibernate...) but the buttons are there,and if i click on the screen where they ought to be they work, yet i cannot see them.... any ideas?
the icon theme you're using is borked. change the icon theme and they should show up.
thats just a guess, but i think the image files for the quit dialogue are missing.
